action.action-desc: Mr. Cárdenas (for himself and Ms. Norton) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to make improvements to the food safety education program carried out under such Act, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Farm to Table Safety Act.
Section 10105(a) of the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 7655a(a)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by inserting , including farm workers, after industry;
in paragraph (1), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (2), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:
practices that prevent bacterial contamination of food, how to identify sources of food contamination, and other means of decreasing food contamination.
